title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama project: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama, allowing easy integration of local LLMs into Python apps.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, works in Node and modern browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain community integration that wraps Ollama models as LangChain LLMs and embeddings.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web interface for Ollama, featuring model management and multi-user support.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built interactive CLI for chatting with Ollama models, including conversation history and context.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style inline suggestions.

title: ollama4j
summary: Unofficial Java SDK for Ollama, providing typed models and async streaming for JVM projects.

title: ollama-rails
summary: Ruby gem that adds Ollama integration to Rails apps with ActiveModel-style interface.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models via slash commands.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset, exposing Ollama models as generators and embedders for RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-compose
summary: Ready-to-use Docker Compose stacks bundling Ollama with WebUI, LangChain, and GPU support.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with autoscaling and PVC support.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Unofficial C#/.NET client for Ollama with async enumerables and System.Text.Json serialization.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that caches and serves Ollama models inside CI pipelines for reproducible LLM tests.
